name: Mini Green Jackal Pup
description:
Mini jackal pups are handcrafted with specially selected runes to be the perfect eternal puppy.
Combine 1 Yellow and 2 Green Mini Jackal Pups with 8 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini White Jackal Pup.
Combine a Green, Blue, and Red Mini Jackal Pup with 8 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Black Jackal Pup.
